text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceCertainty

Statement about the degree of clinical certainty that a Specific Substance was the cause of the Manifestation in an reaction event.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/reaction-event-certainty

name: AllergyIntoleranceCertainty
description: Statement about the degree of clinical certainty that a Specific Substance was the cause of the Manifestation in an reaction event.
